title: The Globe and Mail
cleaned_text: Innovent Biologics, Inc. ("Innovent") (HKEX: 01801), a world-class biopharmaceutical company that develops, manufactures and commercializes high-quality medicines for the treatment of oncology, autoimmune, metabolic, ophthalmology and other major diseases, updated the Phase 1b efficacy and safety results of IBI939 (anti-TIGIT antibody) combined with sintilimab (anti-PD-1 antibody) in previously untreated PD-L1-selected NSCLC without sensitizing mutations at the 2023 American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) Annual
